channel.title: General Books Reading Lists on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Books Reading Lists on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Recent readings. All the books in the past few weeks
item.description: I thought I would give a rundown of some of the books I have been reading recently. In the last couple weeks, I have been interested in non-fiction reading.  I go through phases were I am suddenly really into books on different sociological issues. For instance, the hikikomori book I read awhile ago, and my fascination with any book that is about Chicago and Urban issues. So anyway - I will tell you what I have been reading and what I am in the middle of.
